#### Overview

The [Sentinel-5P Level 0](https://sentinels.copernicus.eu/web/sentinel/technical-guides/sentinel-5p/products-algorithms/level-0){target='_blank'} data refers to the raw data acquired by the Sentinel-5P satellite during its mission. These instruments include the Tropospheric Monitoring Instrument (TROPOMI), which is capable of measuring a wide range of atmospheric pollutants such as nitrogen dioxide, ozone, formaldehyde, and aerosols, among others.
